body.p: Current tax and deferred tax shall be recognised outside profit or loss if the tax relates to items that are recognised, in the same or a different period, outside profit or loss. Therefore, current tax and deferred tax that relates to items that are recognised, in the same or a different period:

li.p: in other comprehensive income, shall be recognised in other comprehensive income (see paragraph 62).
directly in equity, shall be recognised directly in equity (see paragraph 62A).
